item.title: Shortcodes Notice Preview
item.description: normal use Note example: {{% notice note %}} A notice disclaimer {{% /notice %}} teste ghjgh Result: note A notice disclaimer You could custom title : {{% notice note 笔记 %}} A notice disclaimer {{% /notice %}} 笔记 A notice disclaimer tip {{% notice tip %}} A tip disclaimer {{% /tip %}} tip A tip disclaimer info {{% notice info %}} A info disclaimer {{% /notice %}} info

item.title: Jane-Theme Footnote Preview
item.description: Hugo-theme-jane optimized for footnote. When you mouse hover the footnote1 , footnote content will be displayed.
